Class XMPPPatternUtils

  • java.lang.Object

extends Object
    Class for extracting information from jids.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

      • extractClient

        public static ClientTO extractClient(String aliasJid)
                              throws ClientNotFoundException
        This method extracts a client from an alias jid.
        Parameters:
        aliasJid - Jid to extract client id from.
        Returns:
        The extracted ClientTO.
        Throws:
        ClientNotFoundException - If no client was found.

        Returns:
        The extracted client id.

      • extractKenmeiUser

        public static User extractKenmeiUser(String jid)
        This method returns a client extracted from the alias. It uses a ClientDelegate to switch the client.
        Parameters:
        jid - Jid to extract the user from.
        Returns:
        User for the jid.

      • extractKenmeiUserWithoutDatabaseDelegate

        Parameters:
        jid - Jid to extract the user from.
        Returns:
        User for the jid.
